body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Wilson Hotels customer support. My name is Robert Wilson. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Mary Howard.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Mary. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I recently stayed at one of your hotels and was surprised to find a shortage of clean towels.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear about that, Mary. Could you please provide me with your room number and the date of your stay?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My room number was two five six and I stayed from the seventeenth of July to the twentieth.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. We will look into the matter and investigate what went wrong during your stay.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your assistance in resolving this issue.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Mary. If you have any other concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
